p: This study was supported by a Royal (Dick) School of Veterinary Studies Clinical Research Grant. The funding source had no involvement in: the study design; the collection, analysis and interpretation of data; the writing of the manuscript; or the decision to submit the manuscript for publication. J.J.S. is a University of Edinburgh Chancellor's Fellow based at the Roslin Institute. He is supported by strategic funding from the Biotechnology and Biosciences Research Council (BB/P013759/1 and BB/P013732/1). R.J.M. and M.S. were supported by BBSRC through the Institute Strategic Programme funding (BB/J004235/1 and BB/P013740/1). Edinburgh Genomics, The University of Edinburgh, performed the DNA sequencing and generated the raw data. Edinburgh Genomics is partly supported through core grants from NERC (R8/H10/56), MRC (MR/K001744/1) and BBSRC (BB/J004243/1).
